Package org.openidex.search

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FileObjectFilter
    Implementations of this interface define which files and folders should be searched and which should be skipped during search over a directory structure.
    SearchGroup.Factory
    Factory which creates SearchGroup.
    SearchInfo
    Defines which DataObjects should be searched.
    SearchInfo.Files
    Additionally defines which FileObjects should be searched.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataObjectSearchGroup
    Search group which perform search on data objects.
    FileObjectSearchGroup
    Search group which perform search on file objects.
    SearchGroup
    Class which groups individual search types.
    SearchGroup.Registry
    Registry which registers search group factories (SearchGroup.Factory) for search object types.
    SearchHistory
    Shareable search history.
    SearchInfoFactory
    Factory for creating SearchInfo objects.
    SearchPattern
    Pattern describes the search conditions
    SearchType
    Search type is service which provides search functionality on set of nodes.
    Utils
    Search API utility class.
